summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 6, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Franklin Avenue and Boylston Avenue North, from Roanoke Street to Edgar Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8522 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
